name: hourly-api-client
description: A client for use with the Hourly application.

scripts.openapi-generate-client: rm -rf client/release && openapi-generator-cli generate -g javascript -i http://localhost:8080/openapi.json --output 'client/release' --skip-validate-spec --additional-properties=usePromises=true,projectVersion=1.0.0,projectName=ftm-api-client
scripts.openapi-generate-typescript: rm -rf client/typescript && openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-fetch -i http://localhost:8080/openapi.json --output 'client/typescript' --skip-validate-spec --additional-properties=npmVersion=1.0.0,npmName=ftm-api-client
scripts.openapi-server-generate-tests: rm -rf server/release && openapi-generator-cli generate -g python-fastapi -i http://localhost:8080/openapi.json --output 'server/release' --skip-validate-spec && node tests.js
scripts.dev:push-image: sudo docker login && sudo docker push cr2244/ftmcloud:dev
scripts.dev:deploy: npm run dev:build-image && npm run dev:push-image
